name: Real ★1942★
description:
1942, German tanks attacked your island, destroy them and protect your land. Everything will depend on your skill and experience! Make a decision quickly, prove your superiority!
💎💎💎💎💎💎💎💎
Features:
★ Endless gameplay
★ Crazy difficulty level
★ Good soundtrack
★ Can kill time
★ Lots of fun and deaths
★ Minimum, Affordable Price
★ Easy intuitive operation
Control elements: tank ARROWS control and SPACE for shooting
💎💎💎💎💎💎💎💎
